message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item boasts high-quality features that are sure to exceed your expectations. For this extraordinary value, I am offering it to you at an introductory price of $85. I believe this is a fantastic opportunity for you to experience the benefits of our product at a highly competitive rate.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I'm willing to pay a premium for a high-quality product, but I have to stay within my budget. Can we meet in the middle at $75?

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your budgetary concerns, but I would like to respectfully suggest a price closer to the original offer. Considering the value and quality of our product, I propose a price of $80. This still represents a great deal for the exceptional features you will receive. I hope this proposal aligns better with your financial considerations while allowing us to reach an agreeable solution.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $80 is still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to pay $78 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
